title: 'No survivors' in munitions factory explosion after 18 reported missing, police say
description: The blast, which people reported hearing and feeling up to 15 miles away, was at a plant that supplies military explosives.
content:
There are no survivors from a factory explosion that ripped through a munitions plant in rural Tennessee, police have confirmed.
Eighteen people were missing after the huge blast, but Humphreys County Sheriff Chris Davis has now confirmed all died.

title: Lostprophets singer Ian Watkins dies after being attacked in prison
description: Forty-eight-year-old was serving 29-year prison sentence after admitting multiple child sex offences
content:
The convicted child sexual abuser and former Lostprophets singer Ian Watkins has died after being attacked in prison.
He was attacked with a knife by another inmate on Saturday morning, sources confirmed to the PA news agency.

title: Tens of thousands attend pro-Palestinian march in London
description: The demonstration comes a day after a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas took effect in Gaza.
content:
3 hours ago
Maia Davies
Tens of thousands of pro-Palestinian protesters have gathered in central London a day after a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas came into effect in Gaza.

title: Inheritance tax on farmers could be eased in Rachel Reeves budget
description: The chancellor is under pressure to alter plans that have caused months of protest

title: Emergency alert appears on holidaymakers' phones in Majorca
content:
